Job Description: Technical Skills   Skills     Roles and Responsibility   Knowledge of MVC (Must), ASP.Net, C#, Java Script, CSS, SQL Server.   Excellent communication written & verbal.   Utilize established development tools, guidelines and conventions including but not limited to Knowledge of MVC, ASP.Net, C#, Java Script, CSS, SQL Server.
